Package oh_hecc.game_parts.metadata

Interface MetadataReadingInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Heccable, Parseable, SharedMetadata
All Known Implementing Classes:
EditableMetadata
public interface MetadataReadingInterface
extends SharedMetadata
This is an interface which encapsulates all the metadata reading functionality Only contains static methods

  • Field Summary

    Fields inherited from interface oh_hecc.Parseable

    PASSAGE_NAME_REGEX, PASSAGE_NAME_REGEX_WITH_WHITESPACE, STANDALONE_PASSAGE_NAME_REGEX_WITH_WHITESPACE

    Fields inherited from interface oh_hecc.game_parts.metadata.SharedMetadata

    VALID_AUTHOR_REGEX, VALID_TITLE_REGEX

  • Method Summary

    Static Methods 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static java.lang.String findAuthor​(java.lang.String rawData)
    Method to find the author declaration from the metadata
    static java.lang.String findComment​(java.lang.String rawData)
    This reads the multiline comment within the metadata (all lines starting with //)
    static java.lang.String findIfid​(java.lang.String rawData)
    Finds the IFID declaration
    static java.lang.String findStartPassage​(java.lang.String rawData)
    A method that performs the start passage finding stuff
    static java.lang.String findTitle​(java.lang.String rawData)
    A method which finds the title declaration within the metadata
    static java.util.List<Variable> findVariables​(java.lang.String rawData)
    Attempts to find the variable declarations within the metadata stuff, adding each of them to the variables arrayList Variables must be in the form !Var: variableName 1 or more word characters (alphanumeric+underscore) = defaultValue defaultValue must be 1 or more non-whitespace characters optional // comment comment is anything between the // and the end of line optional

    Methods inherited from interface oh_hecc.Heccable

    toHecc

    Methods inherited from interface oh_hecc.game_parts.metadata.SharedMetadata

  • Method Details

    • findStartPassage

      static java.lang.String findStartPassage​(java.lang.String rawData)
      A method that performs the start passage finding stuff
      Parameters:
      rawData - the raw metadata
      Returns:
      the name of the defined starting passage ("Start" if it wasn't defined)

    • findIfid

      static java.lang.String findIfid​(java.lang.String rawData) throws NoMatchException
      Finds the IFID declaration
      Parameters:
      rawData - the raw metadata that the IFID is being searched for in
      Returns:
      the declared IFID within the metadata (if it exists)
      Throws:
      NoMatchException - if no IFID declaration could be found

    • findTitle

      static java.lang.String findTitle​(java.lang.String rawData) throws NoMatchException
      A method which finds the title declaration within the metadata
      Parameters:
      rawData - the raw metadata that is being searched for
      Returns:
      The title of the game (if it was declared)
      Throws:
      NoMatchException - if no title declaration could be found

    • findAuthor

      static java.lang.String findAuthor​(java.lang.String rawData) throws NoMatchException
      Method to find the author declaration from the metadata
      Parameters:
      rawData - the raw metadata being searched through
      Returns:
      the name of the author
      Throws:
      NoMatchException - if no author declaration could be found

    • findVariables

      static java.util.List<Variable> findVariables​(java.lang.String rawData)
      Attempts to find the variable declarations within the metadata stuff, adding each of them to the variables arrayList Variables must be in the form !Var: variableName 1 or more word characters (alphanumeric+underscore) = defaultValue defaultValue must be 1 or more non-whitespace characters optional // comment comment is anything between the // and the end of line optional
      Parameters:
      rawData - the raw metadata that is being looked through
      Returns:
      a List of all the Variable objects

    • findComment

      static java.lang.String findComment​(java.lang.String rawData)
      This reads the multiline comment within the metadata (all lines starting with //)
      Parameters:
      rawData - the full metadata being read
      Returns:
      the multiline comment held within the metadata (as a string)
